Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Relates to defining veteran
Summary: Relates to defining veteran; includes national guard members who have served for at least twenty years, part of which was during any war or period of hostilities.
LawCode: Amd ยง1, Veterans' Services L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the veterans' services law, in relation to defining veteran
